title: Temporal Reasoning Example
context: While Maria was attending a conference in Paris, her colleague John was presenting their project in Berlin.
question: What was happening when Maria was attending the conference?

title: Temporal Reasoning Example
context: The festival started just as the sun was setting.
question: What was occurring as the sun was setting?

title: Temporal Reasoning Example
context: During the time Alex was studying in the library, Emma was working in the laboratory.
question: What was Emma doing while Alex was studying?

title: Temporal Reasoning Example
context: As the new year rang in, the city's fireworks display lit up the sky.
question: What event occurred as the new year was ringing in?

title: Temporal Reasoning Example
context: While the students were taking their final exams, their teacher was grading the previous tests.
question: What was the teacher doing as the students took their finals?

title: Temporal Reasoning Example
context: The thunderstorm hit the town at the same time the concert was supposed to start.
question: What happened when the concert was supposed to start?

title: Temporal Reasoning Example
context: As the CEO was announcing the new product, the company's stock began to rise.
question: What was occurring as the CEO announced the new product?

title: Temporal Reasoning Example
context: During the week that the international summit was held, the local universities hosted various cultural events.
question: What was happening during the international summit week?

title: Temporal Reasoning Example
context: While the family was vacationing in Hawaii, their neighbors were looking after their pets.
question: What were the neighbors doing while the family was in Hawaii?

title: Temporal Reasoning Example
context: As the clock struck midnight, people around the world celebrated the new year.
question: What occurred as the clock struck midnight?
